alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 5:28PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Crow Wing County through 545 PM CDT... At 528 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Ripley, or 17 miles north of Little Falls, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fort Ripley and Saint Mathias around 545 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central and east central Minnesota.
